lines.text: No need to go ballistic on this, let's work something out.
You know what? Shoot me, man, just shoot me!
I got this far and I realized I didn't have anywhere to go.
The highway's back there. You could have made it back to civilization.
Well, at least I could have made it back to L.A.
You folks are from Hawaii and you came to L.A. on your honeymoon?
Yeah. One day we just got sick of living in paradise.
Who would ever believe I'd marry a geek like you?
What makes me a geek? Just because I haven't killed anybody since breakfast, that makes me a geek?
I trusted you, baby, but you never should have trusted me.
What kind of hostage are you anyway?
